title: Penalty kicks, free kicks and goal keeping
brief_description: Begins by dividing the action of taking a penalty kick into its five aspect. Demonstrates the strategies involved in scoring opportunities from direct free kicks near the penalty areas. Santos and Claudio shows the skills associated with goalkeeping.
